tweet_text: @colavitos_ghost @schmangee I fix all my shitty clothes, as well as my nice ones. I think one problem is that replacement clothing is so cheap that people don't want to take the time, and so clothes end up in landfill, which is sad on many levels.  Mending is actually quite easy once you learn how.
